nodes.text: The Griagh was a monstrous, four-headed creature that dwelled in a large cave system on Endor. Although it was long considered to be legendary, the Griagh was very real indeed, and it was awakened late in the Galactic Civil War, when the Galactic Empire established a bunker on the moon. After leaving a trail of devastation, the Griagh was killed by the power of the Sunstar, which was destroyed in the process.
